title: Kazoku Boshu Shimasu
overview: This work is a home drama featuring Shunpei Akagi, who just became a single father three months ago for some reason. When a childhood friend wrote on SNS that "# I am looking for a family" with a humorous idea, Shunpei decided to live under one roof with four adults and three children. They are depicted as having different personalities and values, and eventually becoming a "family".Â
